debugCenters: Show center markers for debugging layout placement

layout._title: Configure how images are arranged in the gallery

algorithm.type: The algorithm used to arrange images in the gallery

sizing._title: Control how image sizes are calculated

adaptive._title: Automatically adjust sizes based on container and image count
adaptive.minSize: Smallest allowed image size in pixels
adaptive.maxSize: Largest allowed image size in pixels

layout.targetCoverage: How much of the container area images should fill (0.3-0.9)
layout.densityFactor: Multiplier affecting how tightly images are packed

spacing._title: Control spacing around and between images
spacing.padding: Space between images and container edges

grid.columns: Number of columns in the grid layout
grid.rows: Number of rows in the grid layout
grid.gap: Space between grid cells in pixels
grid.stagger: Offset every other row for a staggered pattern
grid.jitter: Random offset applied to image positions
grid.overlap: How much images can overlap each other
grid.fillDirection: Order in which grid cells are filled
grid.alignment: Alignment of images within their cells

spiral.tightness: How close spiral arms are to each other
spiral.scaleDecay: Images get smaller toward the outer spiral
spiral.startAngle: Rotation offset for the spiral pattern in degrees

cluster.clusterCount: Number of image clusters to create
cluster.clusterSpread: How far images spread within each cluster
cluster.overlap: How much images can overlap within clusters

wave.amplitude: Height of the wave peaks and troughs
wave.frequency: Number of wave cycles across the container
wave.phaseShift: Offset between rows in the wave pattern
wave.synchronization: How wave phases align across rows
